subject: Missing components
description_text: Hey, I've just received my new pedals including the heightening kit, but unfortunately the components to add the heightening kit haven't been included. Please can you advise? Cheers! Chris

conversations.body_text: Hi Csbelcher1512,  Could you let us know which pedal model you purchased? Please also provide your order number so that we can check it for you. Don’t worry, we’ll take care of it.
Thanks man! Order number - #SSN2371 Pedals - Simsonn Pro X Ultra

Okay, please provide a photo showing all the items you received, and we will confirm the missing items and arrange for a replacement. Due to the recent busy schedule of our warehouse staff, an error occurred. We apologise for the inconvenience caused!

Hi Mate, No worries, mistakes happen! A photograph is impractical right now as I'm now away for a few days, also the pedals have been mostly installed. Basically I'm just missing the parts to install the heightening and heel plates, everything else was included. I'd appreciate if this could be sorted while I'm away? Thanks again, Chris
Hi Csbelcher1512,    Okay, we have arranged for a replacement to be sent to you. Here is your tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045874642007
